Free whitepaper- The Register Guide to Enterprise Virtualization For six years, Larry Page and Sergey Brin told Eric Schmidt that Google should build its own browser, and for six years, he resisted. Google was a small company, Eric Schmidt remembered. "Having come through the bruising browser wars, I didn't want to do that again."
